title: RFC 4347
extract: RFC 4347 Datagram Transport Layer Security April 2006 secure its traffic. ... This memo describes such a protocol: Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS). DTLS is deliberately designed to be as similar to TLS as possible, both to minimize new security invention and to maximize the amount of code and infrastructure reuse.
extract_html: RFC 4347 Datagram Transport Layer Security April 2006 secure its traffic. ... This memo describes such a protocol: Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS). DTLS is deliberately designed to be as similar to TLS as possible, both to minimize new security invention and to maximize the amount of code and infrastructure reuse.
